website_summaries.verdict: An electric skillet that offers a combination of useful features and some issues that could effect its functionality over time.
pros: Round design with a large capacity
Can hold up to five quarts of food
Non-stick surface is easy to clean
cons: Temperatures can be difficult to regulate

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Skillet!!! “Hot Oven”, No Idea
customer_reviews.text: For the most part, I love this skillet. It’s easy to care for, has a very large cooking surface, and heats quickly and evenly. The only issue I have is it specifically says you can bake with it in the product description but the temperature dial is just low-high. No temperatures, which will require a lot of experimentation and probably wasted food on my part. Also the recipe book has no baking recipes, which would have been helpful. But if you are looking for a great skillet to fry, sauté, and so on, this one is he best I’ve tries so far in this price bracket.
customer_reviews.author: CA

customer_reviews.title: Waiting for parts for months!
customer_reviews.text: The knob on the lid cracked during the first use. Called company and said part was on back order. That was 3 months ago! Called again and customer service said part was backordered and "have no idea if or when it will be in". This skillet is useless to me now. DON'T BUY IT!!
customer_reviews.author: annette moccia

customer_reviews.title: I will never order another Dash product
customer_reviews.text: The glass top cracked under pressure the first time I used it. After browning the hamburger meat and adding the other items to the meal, I heard a “snap”. The heat was only on low to medium. Glass went all in the food that I was preparing. So disappointing. I immediately threw everything away. Food, skillet and all. I will never order another Dash product.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Mustard Seed

customer_reviews.title: Looks better than it works.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Red one...took it out of the box and loved the look. The temperature control element that plugs into the skillet would not stay attached. When I finally got it to stay attached, it didn't heat up. Big let down. .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This thing is massive
customer_reviews.text: Way bigger than I thought...size of a small tire. The temperature is not very consistent at the lower levels and you can tell by the food sizzling...then stopping...then sizzling....then stopping. Prepare to stir or move the food a lot. Also mine came with a broken lid handle. Wasn't worth trying to put this tire back in the box over it. The handle broke within the first week because the monstrosity fell out of my dish strainer and it's weight fell all on the handle. It's easy to clean and the color is pretty. Overall I like this brand and have several of their products.
customer_reviews.author: J Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Highly disappointed/Defective skillet!
customer_reviews.text: Highly disappointed in this skillet. After 3rd usage all the aqua paint has begun cracking and falling off and it looks awful. We tried to contact customer service but unable to speak with someone personally due to the COVID restrictions. We are hoping by chance to get this message to the right Dept. We have taken pictures to show it’s defect. It’s only 3 weeks old. :(
customer_reviews.author: fred lewis

customer_reviews.title: Nice electric skillet
customer_reviews.text: I love this electronic skillet. It’s huge and thus is really easy to use and cleans up very well. I bought it for a ski trip we used it to make pancakes and eggs for breakfast every morning and it worked out so well. I had to clean it in a hotel bathroom so the ability to get it clean fast was put to the test. The temp control is nice it does get a lot hotter on the outside but that isn’t a problem for me. My biggest issue is storage at my house, as I said it is very large and thus needs a large place to be stored.
customer_reviews.author: A.C.

customer_reviews.title: Recommendable.👍
customer_reviews.text: I love it so much. It's very light and easy to use. It's also easy to clean. I just wish I had gotten a smaller size. It's a lil too big/wide for my kitchen table.😅 Other than that, it's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Anielyn Moreira

customer_reviews.title: Arrived today - knob for lid missing
customer_reviews.text: My skillet just arrived and upon unpacking, I discovered that the knob for the lid was not included. I removed the knob from my crockpot lid and mounted it to the lid of the skillet. It would be nice to get the intended knob so I don't have to keep; swapping the one from the crockpot between appliances. This skillet is nice; bigger than I had expected. It will be great for cooking teppanyaki and sukiyaki dinners. Just give me the knob for the lid and I'll be happy.
customer_reviews.author: DB in Oregon

customer_reviews.title: Careful of seller did not come with all the parts.
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this pan. Had one for years but it stopped working. Ordered another one and was so excited. But it did not come with the knob to screw into the lid to take it off and on. It’s to expensive to mail back and I don’t have time to rush out to the post office. So I’m a little pissed off and annoyed that it didn’t come with all the parts.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great Skillet
customer_reviews.text: We bought this electric skillet to use for camping. It provided a larger cooking area than our trailer stove provides. It worked very well and we highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED this product....until it seperated the inside cooking surface from the outer shell and started to drop pieces of paint from shell. It's a wonderful size, cooks well and holds enough for a crowd. But I'm sad it hasnt held up at all! Purchased in July and it began falling apart in December.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wintholz

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would have purchased this a long time ago
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for making dinner for a family of 3. It cooks fast, evenly, non stick, easy to clean. You can't put in dishwasher but can rinse out in sink as long as don't submerge in sink. It is great not to have to use multiple skillets on the glass stove top and have to clean up all the mess. This skillet you can cook your entire meal all at once with minimal clean up.
customer_reviews.author: 1st review

customer_reviews.title: Defective item.
customer_reviews.text: The product is defective. The power unit lights up but no heat arrives until you prop the power unit upward. I use a coolie cup. I should have returned it, but several reasons prevented me. I intend to replace it with something else.
customer_reviews.author: Bonita Knoll

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, breakfast and popcorn are a breeze. Gonna make spaghetti sauce soon and I’m sure it will be great. Easy to clean but it’s large so the only hard part is fitting it into the sink a bit to rinse the inside... no complaints. The lid has a rubber seal around the edge for a good seal when cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R

customer_reviews.title: HUGE!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is huge! I love the size and the color!
customer_reviews.author: Cate Osborne

customer_reviews.title: fantastic addition to your kitchen gadgets
customer_reviews.text: I love this!!! I have one for the savory and bought pine for pancakes and other sweeter options. The center is raised a bit so be aware of anything too runny. I can cook 7 burgers on this and it's fantastic! I look forward to trying some pasta bakes and casserole varieties. I will say i have purchased a few for family members and paella was a success! A nice must have!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be careful and keep an eye on this when using!
customer_reviews.text: I have been sent a replacement for this. Arrived today so I’ll see how it goes. I used it once after I got the first one and I could smell something burning. I cooked a simple dish and I’ve been cooking for many years. The bottom burned! I never walk away while cooking and I’m glad I was close. It gets VERY hot underneath so be aware!!. I hope the replacement will be better and safer to use. Still nervous.
customer_reviews.author: CJamison

customer_reviews.title: My favorite large electric skillet
customer_reviews.text: I cook and can my own onion jam and this is the only skillet that is large enough to make a full recipe. I start with 24 cups of onions which eventually cook down. The wide area lets me cook and evaporate the moisture from the onions quickly, 1/4 the time of my regular skillet or on the stove. This is a great tool for large quantity cooking, and for me as a canner, this electric skillet is a must have.
customer_reviews.author: D. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: This cooker is a piece of junk. It burns everything on the low setting. It’s like a tin can. Also on my fourth time using it lt stopped working altogether. Sure would like to return it.
customer_reviews.author: jean ashby

customer_reviews.title: Best Pan EVER!
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth pan to buy! I got my first pan at Walmart on Black Friday. $20 deal. Figured we couldn't go wrong. The lid isn't the best, but the second one I bought, they upgraded their lid a little. The handle on top of lid breaks within a few weeks. However, for overall product USE, that doesn't matter. The pan is a great size and I use it almost daily! I have a family of 7 at home and this makes it SO nice to make meals.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki VanSickle

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. I just wish that it had temperature control settings rather than saying from warm to hot.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Abigail

customer_reviews.title: It's Huge
customer_reviews.text: First off it is massive which I love only thing I wasn't happy about was the paint was chipped when i opened the box so it's peeling off now. And i'd return it but i don't want to drive 40 mins to the closest UPS drop place to return it and wait for a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: No Baking Recipes
customer_reviews.text: Works great as skillet, but the product info talked about baking. Which is the reason I chose it. NOT ONE WORD about baking. NO BAKING RECIPES, as advertised. I am EXTREMELY DISAPPOINTED. "+ Recipe Book for Pizza, Burgers, Cookies, "
customer_reviews.author: Rita Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Fav appliance
customer_reviews.text: My favorite kitchen appliance!!!! This thing is HUGE! I read the other ratings saying it was big but I didn’t expect just how big it would be. Lol. I absolutely love cooking on this skillet and use it several times a week. The fact that it matches my kitchen and is my fav color is a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Jchristy

customer_reviews.title: Worked great until, much too soon, it stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Have you say- when I got this I loved it! So easy to use, truly non stick and easy to use. Heats evenly and accurate to to the dial. Then, went to use it and it just doesn’t work. Plugged it in and no power. So disappointed. Would have been a 5 star but can only be a 2 star for lasting just over 6 months - sorta pricey for that.
customer_reviews.author: Deb O

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased this product Jan 20th...used it for the 2nd time tonight and it won’t heat...dinner half cooked and the frying pan is dead. Light is on but it won’t heat. Very disappointed in this product would not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Julie A DeWitt

customer_reviews.title: Big boy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a huge pan!! I can make huge amounts of one food...or several items at one time. Cooks well..holds temp well. Takes up a whole shelf!!
customer_reviews.author: Eva Terpinas

customer_reviews.title: Did NOT like the way this heats and cooks
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed that there is no degree settings on the dial. Low, med, high is all. For a product that says “precise temperature” you have to guess!! Even between LOW and OFF it’s either boiling or nothing. No simmering that I found and I kept messing with it. I can’t imagine what you would use medium and high for - FRYING I guess. It cleans easy and it is surely big enough but definitely NOT user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Large enough to cook for 5 or more!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my what a great purchase. Easy to cook with and a great size. Large enough to cook for a family of 5
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: POOR QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: .....box was damaged, but product seemed fine. when opened, we were very disappointed with the quality of it. this is the second and last DASH product we will buy. 99% of the products we buy through Amazon are excellent, DASH products are not in that in that catagory.
customer_reviews.author: John Stauffer

customer_reviews.title: I freakimg love this thing.
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. Can cook for my family in it. Makes things a lot easier. Its huge! Awkward if you gotta clean it in the sink. But its easy to wipe clean anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena Bush

customer_reviews.title: Won’t heat up!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for our family reunion over the week of the 4th of July. Started it for the first time and it heated up and then quit in the first 2 minutes and won’t heat back up. I can’t return as return date expired 6/22. Bummer and a waste of $50.
customer_reviews.author: RiverAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am obsessed
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed; I can cook and bake pretty much anything in this oven-pan and it's so easy to clean. I love it! It's so easy to make potatoe pancakes, fried chicken, pizza, double chocolate brownies, tofu fajitas .... etc.. and it keeps the flavors so fresh and fragrant... best kitchen addition ever!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Medina

customer_reviews.title: Dial poorly marked
customer_reviews.text: Really big for large meals and easy to clean. Lid is kinda heavy but seems sturdy. Not a fan of the dial as the setting isnt clear. Its high med low but it gets pretty hot before you get to the low setting. Temp markings would be easier to navigate. Will take trial and error to figure out the settings but otherwise pleased with it
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small space
customer_reviews.text: I live in a multi family house with a finish basement and I bought one of these to cook in the basement when hanging out with friends and family, and its great! Be cautious of the things you put closest to the plug in side, things will cook a little faster than the rest of the skillet but aside from that, it's still a 5 star item
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Worked great up until about a month past the 90 day warranty then just completely quit working. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: No low setting
customer_reviews.text: I like that its easy to clean but when cooking ut doesn't seem to have a low. I bought it to slow cook steak and gravy which doesn't seem to work.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya

customer_reviews.title: stopped working
customer_reviews.text: the pan worked fantastic the first time!! second time would not heat above warm took almost an hour to cook scrambled eggs :(
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Gentry

customer_reviews.title: Love this item
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item you need to be careful of the temp cooks a little hot. But easy to adjust. Don't leave it till you know you have the temperature right
customer_reviews.author: Patricia M.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. I didn’t realize I was buying a family size skillet. But it is perfect. I have 2 other (different) electric skillets and this out does both of them. It cooks evenly. I would HIGHLY recommend this even for a small family or a couple. I easily made 4 grilled cheese sandwiches one night and chorizo with scrambled eggs (12 eggs) another day. Buy it! You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer R. Torres

customer_reviews.title: Cracked after a month of using
customer_reviews.text: After a month of use, the knob for the lid has cracked for no apparent reason. I don't see myself being able to use the skillet if I am not able to use the lid. Very disappointed. And, I'm passed the 30 day return date. That's why my review is getting 1 star.....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: First of all this thing is giant, it takes up most of the counter. It heats up and cooks great, bigger than any pan I have. The dial is labeled low/med/high, I wish it had a temp setting. Because of its size, it’s a little cumbersome to clean. It doesn’t come apart, so the best I can do is wipe it out wit a damp cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Rev. Ronaldo

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: Ergonomical disaster . It's huge and handles are in a bad place relative to the controls . It's also not a flat surface , so things pool around the edges . Poor user design .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for cooking multiple things at once
customer_reviews.text: We are a family of 2 and this still works great for us. We can cook multiple things at once and it heats up very quickly. Nothing sticks to it, although I wish it could come apart for easier cleaning!
customer_reviews.author: Eboni Bell

customer_reviews.title: New favorite kitchen appliance!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for a big family. I made about 2.5 lbs of fried rice in this thing and it cooked everything up so well. There was absolutely no sticking and I could have easily just wiped it clean. My new favorite kitchen appliance.
customer_reviews.author: Whittles

customer_reviews.title: I hope it lasts.
customer_reviews.text: QC at the Dash factory must be lax. The heating element could not be inserted into the opening for it. Inspection revealed that the heated pan portion had not been properly aligned with the base. I had to take the pan apart and align it properly. After washing the lid, I placed it on its side in the drainer. When I went to get it, the rubber seal around the lid had come off. I had to work on it for about 15 minutes to get the seal back onto the rim of the lid. Heats line a champ though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous Fire Hazard!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the size of the skillet and how quickly it heated up but it was a fire hazard! During use of the skillet (less than 6 months after purchasing it) the smell of something electrical burning filled the air. I quickly unplugged it and opened windows to try to get the smell out of the room. I am just thankful I was in the kitchen when it happened and that unplugging it prevented it from catching on fire. I really loved this skillet and wish it had been better quality and safe to use.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: I am using this a lot because it heat up faster and so easy to clean. I can bring it outside to cook. Good product! Nonstick work very well! I
customer_reviews.author: Kim A. Le

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for large families
customer_reviews.text: I love this huge cooking pan! I can cook 7-8 burgers at a time on it. It makes it easy to make large meals. That being said I'm not sure that the heat distributes equally and it is difficult to clean because it is so large and part of it cannot be immersed in water. I'm still giving it four stars because I really like the ease of using it
customer_reviews.author: J. Bell

customer_reviews.title: It is better than described!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I have a big family. It was quick to heat up, Clean up was easy, & I was able to double my recipe for meatballs. The color is better in person, I got the Teal. I would highly recommend this to anyone who has a large family.
customer_reviews.author: Sara B

customer_reviews.title: Good Until it Quit Heating Up, Bad Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great skillet until it stopped working in the middle of cooking, it just died after maybe five or six uses and would no longer heat up, totally wouldn’t buy another one as obviously isn’t good quality very, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Morganfmoms

customer_reviews.title: You can fit so much in this skillet at one time
customer_reviews.text: If you are thinking about this skillet, just get it! This is the best electric skillet I've ever used! BY far better than all the brand names! So easy to clean, you can fit so much in it at one time, cooks evenly, great for family cooking. I love this skillet!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very large and a great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: The only bad thing I can say is the temp control isnt in numbers!! this is a big let down
customer_reviews.author: SLOwen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome huge skillet!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this electric skillet for about three months and from out of nowhere it just stopped working. My husband took the bottom piece of the skillet off and found that the heating element had burned up in two different places. I called the customer service department for the skillet and explained what had happened and my money was refunded. I was really disappointed because I really liked the skillet.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Pacheco

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous for large portions!
customer_reviews.text: I like this skillet much better than the rectangular one we have. It heats evenly & cleans in a snap. I would disagree with reviewers who said you can fit a whole pack of bacon at once. Circular construction isn’t made to hold a lot of straight pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Don't stay on
customer_reviews.text: Love the size but it doesn't stay on, it heats up and then turns off and back on. Takes forever to cook anything.
customer_reviews.author: Larry R.

customer_reviews.title: Don't let this pass you by buy it
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how I lived without this it's light but sturdy LARGE and ROOMY to cook a full meal or a family meal either way you can't go wrong students studio apartment whatever this is the product for you.
customer_reviews.author: Hingham

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tried it yet. Because the plastic part that goes to the back part of the knob on the lid handle broke when I was assembling it. But the company is sending a replacement with a charge. Which is nice. I like how big it is . I want to cook stuff in it so I don't have to turn my oven on
customer_reviews.author: b.barber

customer_reviews.title: Wow....Nice
customer_reviews.text: Better and bigger than expected. The rubber seal comes off the lid for cleaning! Also very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: susan wilson

customer_reviews.title: Burnt Skillet (cooker)
customer_reviews.text: When I used cooker in second time at the bottom smoke came out, I feel like it is dangerous to use it. I would like to return it and take my money back because its has grantee for a year or may more. Please read my mail and let me know how and in which address I able to return the cooker and take my money back. Thank you AB Popalzay
customer_reviews.author: Abdul Basir Popalzay

customer_reviews.title: Attractive kitchen appliance
customer_reviews.text: Great Christmas gift. She used it the very next day and loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Vidal

customer_reviews.title: It’s a pot!
customer_reviews.text: This is a humongous pot ! It’s is really big - bigger that what you would expect. It’s good quality and nice color. If you have a big family or party, it will be a great use.
customer_reviews.author: PS

customer_reviews.title: Easy cleaning, fast cooking. Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is a blessing in disguise. Everybody should have one in their kitchen. Love it use every day
customer_reviews.author: Tiki chai

customer_reviews.title: I love the large size pan!  Cooked pancakes, eggs with sausage, fried noodles, stir frys!
customer_reviews.text: I love the size! It’s perfect for large family cooking. Great for stir frys!!!! I use it all the time, while my husband is cooking on the stove, I’m on the side cooking a large portion (for meal prep) of my vegetarian dishes!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Best electric skillet ever!
customer_reviews.text: I used to cook in an old rectangle electric skillet for my young family but it finally gave out. I ordered this one as it is circular and has a quality glass lid. Oh my the dinner of chicken and dumplings turned out spectacular!
customer_reviews.author: Kris Riess

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love it
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and does its job! Perfect for our camper and cleans very easy! Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer sumrall

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pan do not rust and is stick proof easy to clean too!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it!!!! This my best pan!!!! I tell Everybody!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bernie❤

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it but larger then expected.. I’m keeping it cause I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect , especially for Large families.
customer_reviews.text: Wow!! It is perfect for family meals!! Love cooking surface! Freud rice my new dinner go to!
customer_reviews.author: Susan J. Hines

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Love this large size skillet..perfect for cooking a whole meal...I sometimes have a little trouble controlling the temperature but I would definitely but again
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Szawronski

customer_reviews.title: Best fry pan I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: It's big but there's only 2 of us & it still is very efficient. Would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: cynthia felzer

customer_reviews.title: Electric pan
customer_reviews.text: Love this big pan since we can fry our bacon eggs etc in the same pan at the same time!
customer_reviews.author: Marie L. Leaf

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The handle on the lid broke. I was twisting it on and it cracked. I can still use it and it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I love it. 14” is big, but we’ve been able to cook multiple things in the one skillet, like hamburger and refried beans for taco or scrambled eggs and fried potatoes for breakfast. I like it so much that I keep it on the counter and use it regularly. It’s also really easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Librarian

customer_reviews.title: everything burns
customer_reviews.text: super cheap quality everything burns you may have to use very low temperature and will still burn if you are not constantly checkin, not good to bake and not easy to clean since everything get stick on it. I wish i returned before i give it so many tries. waste of money! :(
customer_reviews.author: RCC

customer_reviews.title: Big size! Good for a whole family
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Good quality. only one small part of the cooker needs to improve, the silicon that covers the glass cover has a strong chemical smell. So we took it off.
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: SIze and function just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. The heating element does an excellent job however if cooking large crepes or tortillas you have to watch the very center to make sure it cooks through. I found by moving the item closer to the edge it worked perfectly. I am still getting used to this pan and have only used it twice, I am very pleased with the purchase and would recommend it. Especially for stir fry , stew and large families.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size great temp settings should be in degrees
customer_reviews.text: Only thing to not like is the temp is low med high and not degrees
customer_reviews.author: melody tasci

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Electric skillet much larger than I anticipated, but, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tamela

customer_reviews.title: Not a pretty color
customer_reviews.text: I expected the pretty aqua, light teal color as shown in Amazon ad. It is far from that, it's a very ugly green. I don't think it would match in anyone's kitchen. I couldn't stand looking at it. Never used as I am returning. It's larger than I thought it would be, about medium pizza size so it may be a storage problem for some people. It is not as heavy as I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Elana

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Used one time, on low setting, and it got way too hot. The paint began bubbling up and peeling.
customer_reviews.author: JBP621

customer_reviews.title: It's big !
customer_reviews.text: I love this skillet it is so big, easy to clean, heats up so fast but I only gave it 4 stars because low it is still way to hot.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Dean

customer_reviews.title: This is a must-have kitchen item
customer_reviews.text: I love this skillet for any meal of the day from eggs and pancakes to sukiyaki and dump meals.. It has a massive cooking area and so far has cooked evenly and as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: skillet.
customer_reviews.text: nice red color. plenty of room to fry lots of things, wife thinks its great.
customer_reviews.author: Arn

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: I've returned it. Heated on one side only. It was very heavy. Would never buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The knib for top of lid
customer_reviews.text: I love the product but the little black dice that attached the knob to the lid was cracked. Any way you can send me a replacement so I dont have to send the whole thing back?
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne L wilmoth

customer_reviews.title: Not the easiest design but okay.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use but I don’t like having to take off the rubber ring Around the lid to clean it.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe Braden

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Way bigger than expected and I guess that’s good! Can a lot on it!
customer_reviews.author: Tommieann

customer_reviews.title: best large Skillet I've found.
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite electric skillet. It's my second one in thus brand. I've purchased other brands that didn't cook evenly. This is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Lana Baker

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I really have use this frying pan a lot. We remodeled our kitchen and I was without a stove for37 days. I ordered 5 to give away for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: The copper looking cooking surface started to peel off after maybe 10 times.
customer_reviews.text: Copper looking cooking surface peeled. We tossed it out in about three weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Spoon

customer_reviews.title: doesn't heat evenly
customer_reviews.text: middle is bowed and doesn't heat evenly, gets real hot around the outside edges
customer_reviews.author: Cora Huey

customer_reviews.title: Easy tonclean
customer_reviews.text: Great for many types of food we use for mostly every thing
customer_reviews.author: donnie goss

customer_reviews.title: Size& temperature control
customer_reviews.text: Very large. The temperature control is not by number ~ it’s low, med, high. Low is not simmer.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t use an electric pan like this in a long time. Large size great for frying our meatballs
customer_reviews.author: joe fox

customer_reviews.title: Don't break the lid... S
customer_reviews.text: Love the size. Finally an electric skillet big enough to cook for my family! One pot dinners are awesome. Because of the size, it is a bit clumsy to clean. But I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Office Clerk

customer_reviews.title: It’ll do
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Enamel is chipping off the minute it was out of the box and can’t submerge to wash. Bigger then expected.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is HUGE! It’s so easy to use and it’s a perfect size for my family. I love that I can easily take it to get togethers easily.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Sizemore

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase a Dash item. Very cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: What a bad choice I made by purchasing this item. Very disappointing. The knob just fell apart on the cover, just cracked. I threw out the box it came in and the receipt. Never will purchase a dash item again.
customer_reviews.author: Connie O'Neill

product_meta.title: Dash DRG214AQ Family Size Rapid Heat Electric Skillet + Hot Oven Cooker with 14 inch Nonstick Surface + Recipe Book for Pizza, Burgers, Cookies, Fajitas, Breakfast & More, 20 Cup Capacity, Aqua
product_meta.description: Color:AquaThe DASH family skillet, 14” is perfect for countertop cooking and entertaining. The ample 14” pan, with a 2. 5” depth accommodates stews, sauces, stir fry's and more for a family of up to 6 people. Braise, simmer, Scramble, sear and sauté, all in your DASH family skillet. The PFOA-free nonstick cooking surface makes it so easy to clean and the removable electric probe and cord make it easy to store. An easy-to-use temperature control adjusts the skillet to 450℉ quickly and cool-touch handles allow for safe transport from your kitchen to the dinner table.
feature_bullets: Large 20 Cup Capacity: 14 inches of cooking surface and 2. 5-Inch depth provides up to 20 cups of cooking capacity (feeding approx. 6 people). perfect for large families or entertaining at parties - anything from burgers, pancakes, pizza, stir fry, fajitas, and more

Rapid heat: cook (or bake), breakfast, lunch, dinner, desserts, or a variety of snacks to cater to even the pickiest of eaters. Quickly heats up to 450℉ in less time than it takes you to heat The stovetop or oven
Tempered glass lid: allows you to safely check on meals during cooking, while proper sealing conserves heat and flavor, so you can serve great meals each and every time

Safer: The truglide PFOA-free, non-stick surface provides an even cook for consistent results and makes clean up a snap. The cool touch handle allows for secure handling during and after use - Easily transfer meals from kitchen to table safely

Includes: backed by a 1-year manufacturer , The 1440-watt family electric skillet + oven includes anti-slip feet, removable Cords, recipe book and recipe database access (all non-electric parts are easily wiped clean)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars736 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
